key.name: interfaces
key.summary: Interfaces to monitor.
key.description: A list of interface names to track statistics on.

key.name: update-interval
key.summary: Seconds between updates.
key.description: How often (in seconds) to update interface statistics.

key.name: display-vertical
key.summary: Whether to display vertically.
key.description: When set to true statistics will be displayed one above another, rather than side by side. Requires that the panel is thick enough to accomodate multiple lines of text.

key.name: decimal-place
key.summary: Decimal places to use in measurements.
key.description: How many decimal places to use in measurements.

key.name: custom-font-family
key.summary: Custom font family for display of statistics.
key.description: Generic CSS font family to display statistics in, instead of the default for your shell theme.

key.name: custom-font-size
key.summary: Custom font size for display of statistics.
key.description: Font size in pt to display statistics in, instead of the default for your shell theme.

key.name: use-fixed-width
key.summary: Whether statistics should be displayed with fixed width.
key.description: Whether statistics should be displayed with fixed width, as opposed to only taking as much room as the current value.

key.name: width-is-minimum
key.summary: Whether the custom fixed width should be used as a minimum width.
key.description: Whether the custom fixed width should be used as a minimum width, still allowing the space alloted to expand if a longer value is displayed.

key.name: custom-fixed-width
key.summary: Width to assign to each statistic.
key.description: Width to assign to each statistic. Statistics will be right-aligned within alloted space.

key.name: use-custom-font-family
key.summary: Whether to use a custom font family.
key.description: Enables the custom font family for display of all statistics.

key.name: use-custom-font-size
key.summary: Whether to use a custom font size.
key.description: Enables the custom font size for display of all statistics.

key.name: use-custom-font-colours
key.summary: Whether to use custom font colours.
key.description: Enables custom font colours for display of each statistic.

key.name: use-custom-decorations
key.summary: Whether to use custom statistic decorations.
key.description: Enables use of custom text at the end of each statistic.

key.name: show-speed-down
key.summary: Whether to show current download speed.
key.description: Enables the display of the current net download speed across all monitored interfaces.

key.name: show-speed-up
key.summary: Whether to show current upload speed.
key.description: Enables the display of the current net upload speed across all monitored interfaces.

key.name: show-speed-total
key.summary: Whether to show current total speed.
key.description: Enables the display of the current total speed across all tracked interfaces.

key.name: show-usage-total
key.summary: Whether to show total usage since last reboot or reset.
key.description: Enables the display of the total network usage on tracked interfaces since the last reboot, or the last usage reset, whichever was more recent.

key.name: custom-speed-down-colour
key.summary: Custom colour for the download speed statistic.
key.description: A custom colour to display the download speed statistic in, as a hex colour code.

key.name: custom-speed-up-colour
key.summary: Custom colour for the upload speed statistic.
key.description: A custom colour to display the upload speed statistic in, as a hex colour code.

key.name: custom-speed-total-colour
key.summary: Custom colour for the total speed statistic.
key.description: A custom colour to display the total speed statistic in, as a hex colour code.

key.name: custom-usage-total-colour
key.summary: Custom colour for total usage statistic.
key.description: A custom colour to display the total usage statistic in, as a hex colour code.

key.name: custom-speed-down-decoration
key.summary: Custom text to decorate download speed statistic with.
key.description: A custom string which can be placed at the end of the download speed statistic.

key.name: custom-speed-up-decoration
key.summary: Custom text to decorate download speed statistic with.
key.description: A custom string which can be placed at the end of the upload speed statistic.

key.name: custom-speed-total-decoration
key.summary: Custom text to decorate download speed statistic with.
key.description: A custom string which can be placed at the end of the total speed statistic.

key.name: custom-usage-total-decoration
key.summary: Custom text to decorate download speed statistic with.
key.description: A custom string which can be placed at the end of the total usage statistic.

key.name: initial-receive-count
key.summary: Total initial received bytes saved from last session.
key.description: Total received bytes from when the extension was last enabled. Used to persist usage records across shell restarts.

key.name: initial-transmit-count
key.summary: Total initial transmitted bytes saved from last session.
key.description: Total transmitted bytes from when the extension was last enabled. Used to persist usage records across shell restarts.

key.name: last-boot-time
key.summary: Boot time as of last time the extension was run.
key.description: Boot time of the system when the extension was last disabled. Used to check of previous initial recieve/transmit counts should be used.
